summary: Website/app to display a live market ticker for NIFTY Top 100 stocks using data sourced from NSE India (nseindia.com).

existing_features.title: Expose a new React Query hook to retrieve NIFTY Top 100 stock data from the backend and refetch it periodically to provide live prices.
Update the website market ticker UI to display NIFTY Top 100 live prices (instead of NIFTY 50), including appropriate label text for live vs closed market state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a market ticker for NIFTY Top 100 stocks sourced from https://www.nseindia.com/ and display live prices on the website

Add backend support to fetch and serve NIFTY Top 100 (NIFTY 100) stock prices sourced from https://www.nseindia.com/ via canister HTTP outcalls, returning an array of Stock items (symbol, companyName, ltp, dayClose).

projectName: Add NIFTY Top 100 live market ticker sourced from NSE India
